}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The wireless card has "WL-121W R1.03" silkscreened on the board. :2x3 MIMO
*[http://www.thg.ru/network/asus_wl500w_wl130n/asus_wl500w_wl130n.html Review on '''THG'''] :[[ASUS WL-500W]] Wireless Router :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4704 @266MHz :Flash: 8MB - ''Spansion'' S29GL064M :RAM: 32MB - 2x ''Hynix'' HY5DU281622ETP (2x 16MB) @200MHz :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM4321L - ASUS WL-121W (Mini PCI Card) :Switch: [[Broadcom]] BCM5325 (10/100Mbps, VLAN/QoS support) :USB: ''VIA'' VT6212L (4x USB 2.0 Hub Controller)
==See also== [http://event.asus.com/networks/win711n/ Win7 supported Wireless Adapters]: *[[ASUS WL-100gE]] *[[ASUS WL-100W]] *[[ASUS WL-103g]] *[[ASUS WL-120g v1]] - [[ASUS WL-500g]], [[ASUS DCW625]] *[[ASUS WL-120g v2]] *[[ASUS WL-130N]] *[[ASUS WL-138g v2]](R2) *[[ASUS WL-138gE]] *[[ASUS WL-160N]] *[[ASUS WL-167g v1]] (v2/v3) [http://event.asus.com/networks/win711n/ EOL Wireless Adapters]: *[[ASUS WL-100g]] *[[ASUS WL-100gD]] *[[ASUS WL-106gM]] *[[ASUS WL-107g]] *[[ASUS WL-120g v2A]](E) - [[ASUS WL-500gP v1]] *[[ASUS WL-130g]] *ASUS WL-121W - [[ASUS WL-500W]] *[[ASUS WL-138g]] *[[ASUS WL-156gM]] - [[ASUS WL-566gM]] *[[ASUS WL-159g]] *[[ASUS WL-160W]] *[[ASUS WL-169gE]] *[[ASUS WL-170g]]
